title: Kanavellam Neethane Song Lyrics Dhilip Varman
stanzas: <div>Kanavellam Neethane Song Lyrics Album by Dhilip Varman

Kanavellaam neethaane
vizhiye unake uyiraanen
ninaivellaam neethaane
kalaiyaatha yugam sugamthaane

paarvai unnai alaigirathe
ullam unnai alaikkirathe
antha neram varum pozhuthu
ennai vathaikindrathe

Kanavellaam neethaane
vizhiye unake uyiraanen
ninaivellaam neethaane
kalaiyaatha yugam sugamthaane

saaral mazhai thuliyil
un ragasiyathai velipaarthen
naanam naan arindhen
konjam pani poovaai nee kuruga

enai ariyaamal manam parithaal
unai maravenadi
nijam puriyaatha nilai
adainthen edhuvarai solladi

kaalam thorum nenjil
vazhum unthan kadha
niyabagangal thinam thinam

Kanavellaam neethaane
vizhiye unake uyiraanen
ninaivellaam neethaane
kalaiyaatha yugam sugamthaane

Thaedal varum pozhuthu
en unarvugalum kalanguthadi
kaanalaai kidanthen
naan un varamaai
vizhi thiranthen

inai piriyaatha nilaiprave
nenjil yaagame
thavithidum podhu
aaruthalaai unmadi saaigiren.

kaalam thorum nenjil
vazhum unthan kadha
niyabagangal thinam thinam

Kanavellaam neethaane
vizhiye unake uyiraanen
ninaivellaam neethaane
kalaiyaatha yugam sugamthaane
